module.header:
<style>
body {
     background-color: #f7f7f7;
     overflow-x: hidden;
}

.bstrap30 .field-container {
    margin-bottom: 5px;
}

.topHR {
     margin-top:-8px;
}

.selected {
   color:  #3FB03F!important;
   font-weight:600;
}

.bstrap30 .form-control[disabled], .bstrap30 .form-control[readonly], fieldset[disabled] .bstrap30 .form-control {
    background-color: #f7f7f7;
    border: none!important;
    padding: 10px 6px!important;
    -webkit-box-shadow: none!important;
    box-shadow: none!important;
}


.bstrap30 .btn-default:hover {
   background-color: #f1f1f1!important;
}

.bstrap30 .btn-default:focus{
   background-color: #f7f7f7!important;
}

.bstrap30 .col-sm-1 {
    text-align: right;
    padding-top: 20px;
    padding-right: 20px;
}

</style>
module.title: LOS Messenger Form
